projectGridLines.title: Sports Data Analytics
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Data visualization and analytics of sports data derived from Wearables & IoT

devices

Skill sets: knowledge of statistical programming languages like R, Python, and database query

languages like SQL, Hive, Pig is desirable. Familiarity with Azure AI-ML, Scala, Java, or C++ is

an added advantage. Knowledge of sensors and sensor fusion is desirable

Traits expectation: Resilient in resource crunched settings, attitude to learn new domains,

enthusiasm for sports

Expected learning: Will learn adequate real-world problems and solutions to become a Data

Scientist

Specific courses required for project execution: Strong in Data science, Math, AI/ML with prior

projects

projectGridLines.title: Embedded Software Development for Wearables & IoT devices
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Develop firmware and associated software using state-of-the-art hardware

development kits and product tech stack

Skill sets: Good understanding of microcontroller architecture (e.g. ARM) and real-time

operating systems, programming skills in C/C++ and scripting languages, Understanding of

Wearable OS and IoT embedded stack, Knowledge of sensors and sensor fusion

Traits expectation: Resilient in resource crunched settings, attitude to learn new domains,

enthusiasm for sports

Expected learning: Will learn adequate real-world problems and solutions to become an

Embedded systems engineer

Specific courses required for project execution: uP, uEL, any prior projects using Arduino and

equivalent EVMs
